Nice hotel with solid amenities - the room was clean with a comfortable atmosphere; great shower pressure and temperature - the AC was a little confusing to set correctly. The breakfast service is included, and is a mix of traditional and standard foods - some of the dishes were quite tasty, and others were bland or stale. But if you knew how to be selective, the good ones largely made up for the presence of lesser ones; personally, that's a telltale sign that the offering menu just needs to be simplified so they can focus on what works. Service in general has been very good, staff are responsive and friendly - to foreigners too; I had an especially good morning service before leaving with Nisya on the breakfast staff. Overall, I think in any other context it would be a 4/5 hotel - but without a doubt probably the best possible option within Pontianak City itself. Pleasant stay, and safe travels reader.
